sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button v-on:click="changeState">Turn {{ btnState }}</button>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
    name: 'NavBar',
    data() {
        return {
            btnState: "On"
        }
    },
    methods: {
        changeState (){
            switch (this.btnState){
                case "On":
                    console.log("changing to off...");
                    let request = {
                        "btnState": (this.btnState).toString();
                    };
                    axios.post("http://localhost:3000/", );
                    break;
                case "Off":
                    console.log("changing to off...");
                    this.btnState = "On";
                    break;
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>
